Nested table with multicol support

Imports

geometry_primitives, hdrawing, term_buf

Types

SizePolicy = enum
  spExpanding, spFixed
GridCell[T] = object
  size: ArrSize
  vertPolicy: SizePolicy
  horizPolicy: SizePolicy
  borders*: Table[RectPoint, string]
  case isItem*: bool
  of true:
      item*: T

  of false:
      grid*: BlockGrid[T]

  
BlockGrid[T] = object
  borders*: TermGridConf
  grid*: MulticellGrid[GridCell[T]]

BlockGridRow[T] = seq[GridCell[T]]

Get total width of columns in colRange, including horisontal grid gap
